title: Entertainment has the Capacity to Ruin Society

content.question: Write an essay that argues your position on the claim that entertainment has the capacity to “ruin” society.

frqParts.text: Write an essay that argues your position on the claim that entertainment has the capacity to “ruin” society.

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Write introductions and conclusions appropriate to the purpose and context of the rhetorical situation.
